tool_description: API that shows new cryptocurrencies listings on exchanges
name: New Cryptocurrencies Listings
title: New Cryptocurrencies Listings

api_list.name: Exchange info
api_list.description: Accepts an exchange name as an input, returns a list of exchanges where the coin is traded, and prices for this coin

api_list.name: News
api_list.description: Returns latest news from all supported exchanges

api_list.name: New Pairs
api_list.description: Returns upcoming currency pair exits on all supported exchanges
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://new-cryptocurrencies-listings.p.rapidapi.com/new_pairs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-cryptocurrencies-listings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Asset Info
api_list.description:
Accepts a coin ticker as an input, returns a list of exchanges where the coin is traded and prices for this coin

**Note: default value for limit is 10**

api_list.name: Set Alert
api_list.description: You can send your email address and for new listings, it will send notifications, if there are no errors it will return status: ok and send a test letter to the email address. Later you will receive an email if new coins start listing at supported exchanges

api_list.name: Supported Exchanges
api_list.description: Returns a list of exchanges from which we receive data
api_list.code:

url = "https://new-cryptocurrencies-listings.p.rapidapi.com/supported_exchanges"

headers = {

        }

api_list.name: Send Email
api_list.description: You can send an email as notification about a new listing to be able to buy it before the price rase

api_list.name: New Listings
api_list.description:
Returns new listings on biggest exchanges(now just Binance, but I'll fix it later)
- status: "ok" or "error"
- anounsments: list of crypto announcements 
-- date: date of announcement at the exchange
-- text: text of the announcement from the exchange
-- title: title of the announcement from the exchange
-- topic: -
-- ticker: ticker of new currency
-- news_url: URL of the announcement
-- news_type: -
-- sentiment: -
-- source_name: name of the exchange

**Note**: updates every 10 minutes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://new-cryptocurrencies-listings.p.rapidapi.com/new_listings"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-cryptocurrencies-listings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
